trans-unit.source: Defines the end of a relationship.
trans-unit.target: Definisce la fine di una relazione.

trans-unit.source: IRelatedEnd defines the requirements for an object that represents an end in an association.
trans-unit.target: IRelatedEnd definisce i requisiti per un oggetto che rappresenta un'entità finale in un'associazione.

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class.
trans-unit.target: Questa interfaccia viene implementata dalla <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>classe.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> is the base class for the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>è la classe base per il <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>e <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>classi.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601></xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un oggetto all'entità finale correlata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A>metodo aggiunge un oggetto all'entità finale correlata.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The related end must be an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: L'entità finale correlata deve essere un <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: When the source object implements <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships> and is being tracked in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>, the object being added is also tracked.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'oggetto di origine implementa <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>e viene registrato nel <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>, viene registrato anche l'oggetto da aggiungere.</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>classe implementa in modo esplicito il <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>classe utilizza questa implementazione.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the related end is an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> and the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A> property of the reference is not `null`, this method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se l'entità finale correlata è un <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>e <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A>proprietà del riferimento non è `null`, questo metodo genera un'eccezione.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>

trans-unit.source: An object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: `entity` must implement <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: `entity`deve implementare <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un oggetto all'entità finale correlata.

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload for entity classes that do not implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo overload del metodo per le classi di entità che non implementano <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method for entity classes that do implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A>metodo per le classi di entità che implementano <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Add aggiunge un oggetto all'entità finale correlata.

trans-unit.source: The related end must be an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: L'entità finale correlata deve essere un <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the Add method.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>classe implementa in modo esplicito il metodo Add.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>classe utilizza questa implementazione.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the related end is an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> and the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A> property of the reference is not `null`, this method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se l'entità finale correlata è un <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>e <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A>proprietà del riferimento non è `null`, questo metodo genera un'eccezione.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>

trans-unit.source: An object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Defines a relationship between two attached objects.
trans-unit.target: Definisce una relazione tra due oggetti connessi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method is used to define a relationship between two objects that are both attached to the same <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A>metodo viene utilizzato per definire una relazione tra due oggetti entrambi connessi allo stesso <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>istanza.</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>classe implementa in modo esplicito il <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation to define relationships between the attached source object and the object attached to the collection.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>classe utilizza questa implementazione per definire le relazioni tra l'oggetto di origine connesso e l'oggetto connesso alla raccolta.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [collegamento e scollegamento di oggetti](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23).

trans-unit.source: The object being attached.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto da connettere.

trans-unit.source: `entity` must implement <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: `entity`deve implementare <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Defines a relationship between two attached objects.
trans-unit.target: Definisce una relazione tra due oggetti connessi.

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload for entity classes that do not implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo overload del metodo per le classi di entità che non implementano <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method for entity classes that do implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A>metodo per le classi di entità che implementano <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Attach method is used to define a relationship between two objects that are both attached to the same <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo di collegamento viene utilizzato per definire una relazione tra due oggetti entrambi connessi allo stesso <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>istanza.</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the Attach method.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>classe implementa in modo esplicito il metodo di collegamento.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation to define relationships between the attached source object and the object attached to the collection.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>classe utilizza questa implementazione per definire le relazioni tra l'oggetto di origine connesso e l'oggetto connesso alla raccolta.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [collegamento e scollegamento di oggetti](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23).

trans-unit.source: The object being attached.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto da connettere.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that represents the objects that belong to the related end.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>che rappresenta gli oggetti che appartengono all'entità finale correlata.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The CreateSourceQuery method is explicitly implemented by the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CreateSourceQuery è implementato esplicitamente dalla <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>classe.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes both override the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.System%23Data%23Objects%23DataClasses%23IRelatedEnd%23CreateSourceQuery%2A> method to return an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> that, when it is executed, returns the same set of objects that belong to the related end.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>e <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>eseguire l'override di entrambe le classi di <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.System%23Data%23Objects%23DataClasses%23IRelatedEnd%23CreateSourceQuery%2A>per restituire un <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>che, quando eseguita, restituisce lo stesso set di oggetti appartenenti all'entità finale correlata.</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.System%23Data%23Objects%23DataClasses%23IRelatedEnd%23CreateSourceQuery%2A> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that represents the objects that belong to the related end.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>che rappresenta gli oggetti che appartengono all'entità finale correlata.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that iterates through the collection of related objects.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>che scorre la raccolta di oggetti correlati.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that iterates through the collection of related objects.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>che scorre la raccolta di oggetti correlati.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether all related objects have been loaded.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se tutti gli oggetti correlati sono stati caricati.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the IsLoaded method of <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: L' <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>classe implementa il metodo IsLoaded <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes inherit from <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>E <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>le classi ereditano da <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the related end contains all the related entities from the database; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'entità finale correlata contiene tutte le entità correlate dal database. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads the related object or objects into this related end with the default merge option.
trans-unit.target: Carica gli oggetti correlati in questa entità finale correlata con l'opzione di unione predefinita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the Load method of <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: L' <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>classe implementa il metodo Load <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: [Load](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end exposed by a navigation property.
trans-unit.target: [Caricare](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) viene chiamato per caricare in modo esplicito gli oggetti correlati da un'entità finale correlata esposta da una proprietà di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [durante il caricamento di oggetti correlati](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> method loads related objects from the data source whether or not <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>metodo carica gli oggetti correlati dall'origine dati o meno <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>è `true`.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: Loads the related object or objects into the related end with the specified merge option.
trans-unit.target: Carica gli oggetti correlati nell'entità finale correlata con l'opzione di unione specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the Load method.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>classe implementa il metodo Load.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes override this implementation.
trans-unit.target: Sia il <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>e <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>classi eseguire l'override di questa implementazione.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: `Load` is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end that is exposed by a navigation property.
trans-unit.target: `Load`viene chiamato per caricare in modo esplicito gli oggetti correlati da un'entità finale correlata esposto da una proprietà di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [durante il caricamento di oggetti correlati](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).

trans-unit.source: The Load method loads related objects from the data source whether or not <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Load carica gli oggetti correlati dall'origine dati o meno <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>è `true`.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref> to use when merging objects into an existing <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"> </xref> da usare quando si uniscono gli oggetti in un oggetto esistente <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the relationship in which this related end participates.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della relazione di cui fa parte questa entità finale correlata.

trans-unit.source: The name of the relationship in which this <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd"></xref> is participating.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della relazione in cui il <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd"> </xref> fa parte.

trans-unit.source: The relationship name is not namespace qualified.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della relazione non è qualificato con lo spazio dei nomi.

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the metadata for the related end.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un riferimento ai metadati per l'entità finale correlata.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet"></xref> object that contains metadata for the end of a relationship.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet"> </xref> oggetto che contiene i metadati per la fine di una relazione.

trans-unit.source: Removes an object from the collection of objects at the related end.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un oggetto dalla raccolta di oggetti nell'entità finale correlata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method removes an object from the related end.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A>metodo rimuove un oggetto dall'entità finale correlata.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The related end must be an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: L'entità finale correlata deve essere un <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>classe implementa in modo esplicito il <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>classe utilizza questa implementazione.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da rimuovere dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: `entity` must implement <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: `entity`deve implementare <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: if entity was successfully removed, if entity was not part of the .
trans-unit.target: if entity was successfully removed, if entity was not part of the .

trans-unit.source: Removes an object from the collection of objects at the related end.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un oggetto dalla raccolta di oggetti nell'entità finale correlata.

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload for entity classes that do not implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo overload del metodo per le classi di entità che non implementano <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method for entity classes that do implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A>metodo per le classi di entità che implementano <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Remove method removes an object from the related end.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Remove Rimuove un oggetto dall'entità finale correlata.

trans-unit.source: The related end must be an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: L'entità finale correlata deve essere un <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the Remove method.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>classe implementa in modo esplicito il metodo Remove.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>classe utilizza questa implementazione.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da rimuovere dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: if entity was successfully removed; if entity was not part of the .
trans-unit.target: Se entity è stato rimosso correttamente; if entity was not part of the .

trans-unit.source: Gets the role name at the source end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome del ruolo nell'entità finale di origine della relazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the SourceRoleName property.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>classe implementa la proprietà SourceRoleName.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.SourceRoleName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.SourceRoleName%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.SourceRoleName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: Viene specificato il nome del ruolo per il `Role` attributo del `End` elemento dell'associazione che definisce la relazione nel modello concettuale.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [elemento Association (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).

trans-unit.source: The role name at the source end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del ruolo nell'entità finale di origine della relazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the role name at the target end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome del ruolo alla fine della destinazione della relazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the TargetRoleName property.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>classe implementa la proprietà TargetRoleName.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.TargetRoleName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.TargetRoleName%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.TargetRoleName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: Viene specificato il nome del ruolo per il `Role` attributo del `End` elemento dell'associazione che definisce la relazione nel modello concettuale.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [elemento Association (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).

trans-unit.source: The role name at the target end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del ruolo alla fine della destinazione della relazione.
